params:
{
	"x_axis_sort_series_ascending": true,
	"x_axis": "upsert_date",
	"time_grain_sqla": "P1W",
	"show_legend": true,
	"viz_type": "echarts_area",
	"groupby": [
		"sender_name"
	],
	"order_desc": true,
	"legendType": "scroll",
	"legendOrientation": "top",
	"x_axis_sort_asc": true,
	"only_total": true,
	"x_axis_sort_series": "name",
	"adhoc_filters": [
		{
			"operator": "==",
			"comparator": true,
			"clause": "WHERE",
			"subject": "has_reel",
			"operatorId": "IS_TRUE",
			"expressionType": "SIMPLE"
		},
		{
			"operator": "==",
			"comparator": "%{chat_id}",
			"clause": "WHERE",
			"subject": "chat_id",
			"operatorId": "EQUALS",
			"expressionType": "SIMPLE"
		},
		{
			"expressionType": "SIMPLE",
			"subject": "upsert_date",
			"operator": "TEMPORAL_RANGE",
			"comparator": "Last year",
			"clause": "WHERE"
		}
	],
	"show_value": true,
	"seriesType": "line",
	"row_limit": 10000,
	"rich_tooltip": true,
	"y_axis_format": "SMART_NUMBER",
	"color_scheme": "supersetColors",
	"metrics": [
		{
			"aggregate": "COUNT",
			"column": {
				"column_name": "sender_name"
			},
			"label": "COUNT(sender_name)",
			"expressionType": "SIMPLE"
		}
	],
	"opacity": 0.2,
	"tooltipTimeFormat": "smart_date"
}
